meanings.definition: Letters, packages, etc., that are sent or delivered by means of the postal system.
meanings.sent1: I received a lot of mail today.
meanings.sent2: She always checks her mail in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The mail arrived just in time for her birthday.
meanings.sent4: His face lit up like a mailbox full of mail.
meanings.sent5: The postman delivered the mail with a smile.

meanings.sent1: I will mail the letter tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: He mailed the package to his friend.
meanings.sent3: She decided to mail her thoughts instead of speaking.
meanings.sent4: His words were like letters mailed straight to her heart.
meanings.sent5: The message was carefully mailed to avoid any mistakes.

meanings.definition: A bag or wallet for carrying letters or postal matter.
meanings.sent1: She carried her mail in a small bag.
meanings.sent2: The postman's mail bag was heavy today.
meanings.sent3: His mail wallet was filled with important documents.
meanings.sent4: Her mail bag was like a treasure chest of letters.
meanings.sent5: The old mail bag had seen many journeys.
